item.title: A scalable generative model for dynamical system reconstruction from neuroimaging data
item.description: New scalable algorithm reconstructs brain dynamics from short neuroimaging data, overcoming limitations of existing methods and enabling more accurate, efficient analysis of large-scale brain activity…
